name: Everyday Wizard
description:
Play in fullscreen to get the full experience.
The game is completed, when you see the cutscene at the end of your quest (plot twist).
You, a wizard accidentally teleported himself and his king and queen, into a modern day kitchen.  

The teleportation made the royal highness hungry, so you are tasked with finding them food.

You must use your magical power inorder to find food in this strange place.

Controls:

Movement:  Arrow key

Action/magic:  space bar

There was not time to add any sounds.

Made at Nordic game jam Online 2020

By:

Group:  everyday wizards

Art:    Rosentia

Coding:  ln191    and avokadoh
